statements: UPDATE QualityControlMeasuresInNanotechManufacturing SET MeasurementValue = 15.75, MeasurementDate = '2022-10-15' WHERE ID = 1;

UPDATE QualityControlMeasuresInNanotechManufacturing SET MeasurementValue = 9.87 WHERE SampleID = 101 AND MeasurementUnit = 'nm';
UPDATE QualityControlMeasuresInNanotechManufacturing SET InspectorName = 'Dr. Smith', MeasurementDate = '2023-08-15' WHERE ID = 5;
UPDATE quality_control SET product_name = 'Product A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE measurement_data SET measurement_value= 15.5 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE quality_control SET quality_standard='ISO 9001', inspector_name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE measurement_data SET measurement_value=12.5, measurement_date='2022-03-15' WHERE product_id=3;
UPDATE quality_control SET measurement_result = 9.8 WHERE qc_id = 1;
UPDATE manufacturing_processes SET location = 'Factory A' WHERE process_id = 2;
UPDATE quality_control SET measurement_result = 8.5 WHERE qc_id = 101 AND parameter_name = 'Temperature';
UPDATE manufacturing_processes SET location = 'New Facility' WHERE process_name = 'Assembly Line' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE QualityControlMeasures SET manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ProductQualityAssessment SET passed_quality_test = true, assessment_date = '2023-07-15' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE QualityControlMeasures SET standard_compliance = FALSE WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
UPDATE NanotechnologyStandards SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE standard_name = 'Nano Standard XYZ';
UPDATE quality_control_measures SET qc_description = 'Updated description' WHERE qc_id = 1;
UPDATE nanotechnology_manufacturing SET manufacturer_location = 'New York' WHERE manufacturer_id = 2;
UPDATE quality_control_measures SET qc_name = 'Updated QC Name', qc_description = 'Updated QC Description' WHERE qc_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_records SET compliance_status = true, record_date = '2022-06-30 10:00:00' WHERE record_id = 5;
